description: Enterprise techniques used by BOOTRASH, ATT&CK software S0114 v1.1
name: BOOTRASH (S0114)

techniques.comment: BOOTRASH has used unallocated disk space between partitions for a hidden file system that stores components of the Nemesis bootkit.[2]
BOOTRASH is a Volume Boot Record (VBR) bootkit that uses the VBR to maintain persistence.[1][2][3]
